doc.title: Italian public's reaction to Berlusconi conviction and sentence - video
doc.author: Guardian staff reporter
doc.description: Italians on the streets of Rome respond to former prime minister Silvio Berlusconi's seven-year prison sentence

main.head: Italian public's reaction to Berlusconi conviction and sentence - video
main.p: This article is more than 11 years old

Italian prime minister Silvio Berlusconi's sentencing to seven years in prison has sparked mixed reactions in the country. On the streets of Rome, Italians respond to the controversial verdict over whether it was too tough or fair. They also consider what it will mean for the future of Italy
